articles.description: Indian wrestler Babita Kumari took her social media to announce her pregnancy with husband and Vivek Suhag. The 'Dangal' girl said she is 'excited and is waiting to start this new chapter'.

articles.description: The LA Clippers are losing a key contributor as Sixth Man of the Year Montrezl Harrell agreed to sign a two-year deal with the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday, agent Rich Paul of Klutch Sports told ESPN.
articles.content:
